"The One Who Destroys Barriers":
"I wonder if you know about this?
There is a rumor about sightings of
an unknown automata hostile right here
in the residential area that's being attacked!
There are people saying that it wasn't an automata
also so...the truth of the situation is still unknown!
Aren't you just bubbling with interest?
You are!　I need your help!　Go and take a video for me!
"

"今話題のこんな話、知ってるかなっ！
襲撃されてる市街地のまっただなかに
見たことのない機甲種みたいな敵を
目撃したってウワサ！
「あれは機甲種じゃない」って言ってる人も
いるみたいだし……真偽不明なんだよねっ！
なんなんだろ、ちょっと興味わかないかな？
わくよね！　お願い！　映像撮ってきてっ！
"
